text: "We Belong Together" is a song recorded by American singer and songwriter Mariah Carey from her album The Emancipation of Mimi. The song is available in several versions. It reached #1 on the Billboard Hot 100 and stayed there for 14 weeks. With the song, Carey holds the record for having the longest-running and second-longest running songs at #1 in the US (her song "One Sweet Day" with Boyz II Men stayed on top for 16 weeks). It was also No.1 in Australia and the Netherlands. It was the best-selling song in the US of 2005 and later became Billboard's Song of the Decade for the 2000s (2000â€“09). It won two Grammy Awards. ==References== category:2005 songs Category:Mariah Carey songs Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs Category:R&B; ballads Category:R&B; songs
title: We Belong Together
